===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|哥|欠|t2=blow|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}}.

Note that the components on the left are {{zh-l|*可}}, with two separate strokes (horizontal and vertical: 一 + 丨) on the upper right, rather than single turning stroke, as in {{zh-l|*句}}. In fact, {{zh-l|*口}} is drawn ''between'' the {{lang|zh|一}} stroke and the {{lang|zh|丨}} stroke.
